identity.name: Clarity Labs
identity.aesthetic: High-end SaaS, White & Black, Sky Blue Accents, Clean Typography
identity.target_audience: SaaS founders, growth teams, product marketers

usage.card_bg: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 h-12 px-8

cards.style: rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 bg-white p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: flex h-12 w-full rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-transparent px-4 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-sky-500 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

assets.icons: Use lucide-react for all icons. Prefer thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.

universal_guidelines: Do not use dark mode. Force light mode in tailwind config.
Use 'Syne' font for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'DM Sans' for body.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use generous padding (py-24, py-32) between sections.
Avoid generic gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle mesh gradients if absolutely necessary.
Cards should have rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl corners.

For the Client Logo Strip: Since specific logos are hard to source, use a Marquee component with the COMPANY NAMES typed out in the 'Syne' font, bold and uppercase, in a light gray color (text-slate-300). This looks cleaner and more premium than mismatched logo SVGs.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge sonner react-fast-marquee`
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` to include the custom colors and fonts defined above.
3. Add the Google Fonts link to `index.html` or import in `index.css`.
4. Create a `Layout` component that wraps pages and handles the Navbar and Footer.
5. Implement the Home page with the sections defined in the problem statement.
6. Implement the Pricing page with the 3-tier cards.
7. Ensure the 'Book a Call' CTA is prominent in the Navbar.
8. Use the provided image URLs. If an image fails to load, fallback to a clean gray placeholder.
